question: What is the central healthcare facility located in the southern part of Trakai, Lithuania?
true_answer: Trakai District Central Hospital and Polyclinic.
asked_question_translated: Litvanya'nın Trakai kentinin güney kesiminde yer alan merkezi sağlık tesisi hangisidir?
answer: Trakai Kapsamlı Sağlık Merkezi (Trakų poliklinika), Trakai kentinin güney kesiminde yer alan merkezi sağlık tesisidir.
answer_translated_eng: Trakai Comprehensive Health Centre (Trakų poliklinika) is the central health facility located in the southern part of the city of Trakai.
